channel.title: 1 hour a day
channel.description: OMG i"ll idmit i am a computer nerd. but my mother dosent have to ruin my life and let me on the computer for 1 hour a day in the summer :eek: who think's thats so GAY!!! Post below what u think then ill show my mom.

item.title: 1 hour a day
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Javafire, post:29, topic:347857”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=444239.msg3261887#msg3261887 date=1278556170]

You around 130, krack? Because thats about my weight and I’m also 6’

“According to your height of 6’ 0” your ideal healthy weight is 165 pounds. Your recommended weight range is between 147 and 183 pounds."
[/quote]Well that could explain why my ribs and spine are so visible

it’s called sitting on a chair playing runescape all day, my brother has the same problem, you don’t get up to eat or anything, and when you gotta go, you just hold it untill pvp battle is up. He drives me nuts hogging MY COMPUTER to check out the latest highscores.[/quote]I actually eat a shitton of food, and most of it is fatty too. My mom says that when I stop growing it might be more noticeable (I grow roughly 4-5" a year).

item.title: 1 hour a day
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:19, topic:347857”][quote author=(Anthony) link=topic=444239.msg3261860#msg3261860 date=1278555541]

Thats not bad, little kids do need to get out. You shouldn’t waste your life on your computer if you had more moderation of the time you spend on the computer maybe you mom wouldn’t have to do it for you.

So yes I do agree with your mom.

iirc you’re fat.

I ain’t that fat… but ofc I am a little fat because I am a American DUH!

brb blaming obesity on my place of residence.
[/quote]
Good at least we are on the same page now, also i am not over weight though lol.[/quote]
fuck off you’re fat get over it.

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:20, topic:347857”][quote author=(Anthony) link=topic=444239.msg3261860#msg3261860 date=1278555541]

Thats not bad, little kids do need to get out. You shouldn’t waste your life on your computer if you had more moderation of the time you spend on the computer maybe you mom wouldn’t have to do it for you.

So yes I do agree with your mom.

iirc you’re fat.

I ain’t that fat… but ofc I am a little fat because I am a American DUH!

brb blaming obesity on my place of residence.
[/quote]

Actually obesity can be caused from the environment you grow up in. Simple as that.http://www.endotext.org/obesity/obesity7/obesity7.htm[/quote]
ever heard of SELF CONTROL?

item.title: 1 hour a day
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

i use the computer everytime i’m free from, chores, the gym, pool, or any other event i have. But i don’t fully agree with your mom, she should add a timer to it too XD Norton is pretty good at that

[quote=“rip4d, post:12, topic:347857”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=444239.msg3261847#msg3261847 date=1278555240]

Thats not bad, little kids do need to get out. You shouldn’t waste your life on your computer if you had more moderation of the time you spend on the computer maybe you mom wouldn’t have to do it for you.

So yes I do agree with your mom.

Naa fuck that, imo, the computer’s as we know them today, are bringing the world together. Think about before we had anything besides letters. Someone could die, and you wouldn’t know about it for, sometimes, a few months. Now, it will be spread across the globe (as long as its someone we care about?) in a few hours.

@Topic - Its good to be off of the computer yes, but 1 hour a day barely gives you time for much.

@rip4d - Sign, I wish i could say i do that, instead, the only thing to do around me is go to the mall. Then i feel uncomfortable because thees a bunch of “sand-niggers” there lol.
[/quote]Malls are uncomforting me too lol xD

Ghetto people scare me, especially when i see a cigarette tucked behind their ear.[/quote]not all smokers are from the ghetto newb -.-

Read full topic

item.title: 1 hour a day
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:11, topic:347857”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=444239.msg3261848#msg3261848 date=1278555293]

are u crazy?

No I am not, I go on the computer a lot, but I go outside or chill with my friends for like 10+ hours in total.(Yes everyday) This is what I do for my day…

I wake up at around noon.
Get a shower/other morning stuff.
Get on the computer until 7ish?
Go hang out with my friends/family until 4ish in the morning.(or if I am not feeling good I am on my laptop)
[hr]

If you are not able to control your computer addiction then yes your mom is right.

and btw you are a kid forever if you want:D I mean a 80 year old can go clubbing too ask my grandpa.
[/quote]
Thus the reason, I am trying to get a job. Wow, I feel as if I need to go to a therapist now.[/quote]
You can come over to my house id be happy to lay you on a bed, and ask you how you day has been

Read full topic
